alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 10:56AM MST until October 15 at 11:30AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 1130 AM MST. * At 1055 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seville, or near Gilbert, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, East Mesa, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park and Falcon Field Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 152 and 157. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 6. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 190. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
